Alek came up and grabbed the gun out of

Eman stones military training initially

lesson the episode should give for
people around the world hiding or
sitting back is not going to accomplish
anything and the gunman would have been
successful if my friend Spencer had not
got enough so I just want that lesson to
be learned going forward the three
Americans have been invited for a

thanks from an admiring and grateful
nation Hugh Schofield BBC News Paris
